definitions.text: communicated in the form of words
of or relating to or formed from words in general
of or relating to or formed from a verb
examples: verbal adjectives like `running' in `hot and cold running water'

definitions.text: relating to or having facility in the use of words
examples: a good poet is a verbal artist
a merely verbal writer who sacrifices content to sound
you put me to forget a lady's manners by being so verbal
